title: Buffalo Open
text:
The Buffalo Open was a <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament on the <a href="Nationwide%20Tour">Nationwide Tour</a>. It was played in 1990 and then went on a hiatus until it returned in 1995 and 1996. It was played at <a href="Brierwood%20Country%20Club">Brierwood Country Club</a> in <a href="Hamburg%20%28village%29%2C%20New%20York">Hamburg, New York</a>.
In 1996 the winner earned $36,000.
Winners.
NIKE Buffalo Open
Ben Hogan Buffalo Open
